Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema

this package contains the NiReports Schema definition interfaces, out-of-the-box measures and columns plus commonly-used classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour<V extends NiOutCell>
    a specification of the behaviour of a given NiReportColumn / NiReportMeasure
    IdsAcceptor
    a dimensionalities resolver which decides whether a (level, id) coo is on the same straight line as an another (level, id) coo.
    NiReportsSchema
    an interface describing the Schema of an API's reporting needs.
    SchemaSpecificScratchpad
    An interface instances of which are created by the schema at early NiReportsEngine initialisation time by calling NiReportsSchema.generateScratchpad(NiReportsEngine).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BooleanDimension
    NiReports' hardcoded boolean dimension, used for yes/no/undefined columns
    ConstantNiDimension
    a NiDimension which uses a constant tabular bidimensional array as a source of data
    DimensionLevel
    a class describing a Level of a dimension.
    DimensionSnapshot
    a snapshot of a NiDimension at a given moment
    IdentityIdsAcceptor
    an IdsAcceptor which does equality testing on the id (most useful for degenerate dimensions)
    NiCombinationContextTransactionMeasure
    Measure defined as a linear combination of context measures (instances of NiCombinationContextTransactionMeasure).
    NiComputedColumn<K extends Cell,V extends NiOutCell>
    a column whose values are computed at "flatten" stage, with no fetched data
    NiDimension
    a class describing a set of related Columns, arranged in a stack.
    NiDimension.Coordinate  
    NiDimension.LevelColumn
    a class signaling that a column is a level in a multi-column Dimension (for example: "Donor type" in the "Organizations" dimension or Primary Sector SubSubSector in the "Sectors" dimension)
    NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage
    an immutable class for managing an instance of a Dimension (e.g.
    NiFormulaicAverageMeasure
    a measure whose behaviour is fully defined by a formula and flags governing its totals strategy; for trail cells it outputs the average value throughout the activities; for individual rows it displays the ER closely related to NiFormulaicMeasure
    NiFormulaicMeasure
    a measure whose behaviour is fully defined by a formula and flags governing its totals strategy
    NiLinearCombinationTransactionMeasure
    a measure defined as a linear combination between trivial NiTransactionMeasures
    NiMultipliedFilterTransactionMeasure
    a measure defined as a filtered transaction multiplied by a number: for each cell, a configured callback decides a multiplier for it.
    NiPredicateTransactionMeasure
    a measure defined as being the result of applying a Predicate on either filtered or unfiltered cells and outputting the nonnull ones
    NiReportColumn<K extends Cell>
    a NiReports definition of a column name fetching use as a hierarchy behaviour under aggregation, filters, etcs
    NiReportedEntity<K extends Cell>
    specifies an entity a report can be run on, e.g.
    NiReportMeasure<K extends Cell>
    a class which holds complete info for NiReports so that those know how to process them (please see NiReportColumn).
    NiTransactionContextMeasure<K>
    a measure defined as a transaction which is filtered based on context
    NiTransactionMeasure
    a trivial measure defined as a filter
    PerformanceAlertTypeDimension
    NiReports' hardcoded boolean dimension, used for performance alert type columns
    SqlSourcedColumn<K extends Cell>
    a column which fetches its input from an sql view/table.
    TabularSourcedNiDimension
    a NiDimension which uses a tabular bidiarray as a source of data.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TimeRange
    types of supported resolutions for specifying the date of a cell

Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema Description

this package contains the NiReports Schema definition interfaces, out-of-the-box measures and columns plus commonly-used classes. The high-level entry point is the NiReportsSchema, which defines a set of NiReportColumn columns, a set of NiReportMeasure measures, filtering instructions and various callbacks.
